subject: Thank you for your recent loan request, we are accepting your refinance debt request
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire TODAY):
$469,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this quick form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://bathaeonand.com/
